name: Actresses' Movie Debuts Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
The Burning.

	Holly made her debut in this 1981 horror movie about a man that gets badly burned in a summer camp prank and then seeks revenge on the campers that caused his demise.  Her character's name is Sophie.

Naked in New York.

	Calista played an acting student in this comedy romance about a man who faces all of the pressures of life along with the help of his girlfriend.  Eric Stoltz and Mary Louise Parker co-star in this 1994 film.

Body Heat.

	Kathleen stars as a young vixen who seduces William Hurt's character into murdering her rich husband in this 1981 thriller.

Family Prayers.

	Brittany had a very small part in this family drama from 1993 that starred Joe Mantegna and Anne Archer.  "Clueless" from 1995 was her first major breakthrough role as Tai Fraiser.

That Night.

	Eliza plays a young girl who becomes infatuated with the wild girl from across the street.  Juliette Lewis and C. Thomas Howell also star in this drama romance film from 1992.

Father of the Bride.

	This 1991 family comedy featured Kimberly as Annie Banks.  It was a remake of the Spencer Tracy and Elizabeth Taylor classic from 1950.  Kimberly can currently be seen in the Jim Belushi sitcom "According to Jim" on ABC.

Poltergeist III.

	Lara starred in the last of this tragic trilogy.  The movie was plagued with several eerie things that delayed the filming and almost prevented it from ever being released.  Tom Skerritt, Nancy Allen, and Heather O'Rourke starred in this horror film from 1988.  This was also Heather O'Rourke's final film before her untimely death in February 1988.

Last Action Hero.

	Bridgette stars as Arnold Schwarzenegger's daughter in this 1993 action bomb.  She married Pete Sampras in 2000 and is currently pregnant with their first child due at the end of 2002.  She has also been credited as Bridgette Wilson-Sampras.

questions.explanation:
Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes.

	Although this was her first film her southern accent was so thick that her voice was completely dubbed by Glenn Close.  However, it was not until her role in "Sex, Lies, & Videotape" that her career really took off.  She later went on to have starring roles in "Green Card", "Groundhog Day", and "Four Weddings and a Funeral".

The Stepford Wives.

	Mary Stuart Masterson had a very small role in this 1975 classic thriller.  She has had a successful film career and starred along side actors such as James Woods, Gene Wilder, and Christian Slater.
